title: Ping issues after patch 7.5
body:
I use to get 150+ ping before the patch updates, now i get 300+ with packet loss and the client downloaded patch updates twice, and my friends are having the same issues. any reason why this happened?
 {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: I am having the same problem, I am from Doha. I used to have 132 to 133 ping now its over 140 and way laggy. I need help.
i used to have 79.. after patch7.5 it become 104 .. every thing else is fine{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
and today my client downloaded the same patch on its own for the 4th time, i see some other guys are having the same issue too

150 is pretty high on it's own, so it sounds like you've got some kind of network issue that's been degrading and finally giving out (unless you're physically playing very from from the NA service).  You can run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of your matches over time to be sure.  

For your specific case, though, I suggest running though the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to work towards strengthening things up.  Hopefully that will do the trick!
